overview:
Alon brings over 11 years of experience in software development and software architecture to Pageonce, with broad experience in security, system engineering, web architecture and enterprise architecture. He previously served as a senior architect for HP Software R&D where he was responsible for the architecture of the Business Availability Center and the Universal CMDB. Prior to that, Alon held multiple architecture positions in Mercury Interactive R&D.

Alon holds a B.S.c in Computer Science, cum laude, from the Academic College of Engineering, Tel-Aviv.
